name: TeraBillon
description:
You wake up and noticed that you are in a different world.. Traverse within the mysterious domain of the encapsulated colony..

"Hold Jump to fly!"

Theme: As Above So Below

For Epic MegaJam 2022

INSTRUCTIONS:

 Game is split into two partitions [.001, .002];  Please download both of the files..

(Recommend to use 7-zip) to extract..

WIP (codename of project: FirstyChallenger)

Originally planned of a 3-tiered system (3 persona approaches of Gameplay), Upcoming media will follow for details..

Independently made the 3D Models (Character, Environment), Shaders, and Music Soundtrack
